landing.title: Hel Qofka Kugu Habboon
landing.subtitle: Ku xidh dad cajiib ah Afrika oo dhan

features.liveStreamingDesc: Daaw oo la xiriir dad waqti dhabta ah
features.videoChatDesc: Yeelo wadahadallo fool ka fool degdeg ah

features.triviaDesc: Ku ciyaar dadka kale oo ku guulayso abaalmarino xiiso leh
